message_1: What is the minimum number of crossings required to turn an unknot (a simple loop of rope with no crossings) into a trefoil knot (a knot with three crossings)?
message_2: The minimum number of crossings required to turn an unknot into a trefoil knot is 3 crossings. The trefoil knot is the simplest nontrivial knot, and it has exactly 3 crossings. To transform an unknot into a trefoil knot, you would need to create these 3 crossings.
